name: @mindweave/mobile
description: Mindweave mobile app - Native wrapper for iOS and Android

scripts.copy-assets: cp -r src/index.html dist/ && cp -r resources dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.ios:build: npm run build && cap sync ios
scripts.android:build: npm run build && cap sync android
scripts.fastlane:build: cd android && bundle exec fastlane build
scripts.fastlane:upload-internal: cd android && bundle exec fastlane upload_internal
scripts.fastlane:upload-production: cd android && bundle exec fastlane upload_production
scripts.fastlane:upload-metadata: cd android && bundle exec fastlane upload_metadata
